title: FIRST AID EMPTY GLASS BOX - Made from High Grade GI Metal, Front Toughened Glass Fitted, With Security Lock On Door For Safety
body:
Features and Benefits:

  • Plantex First Aid Metal Box (Large)
  • Secure & Transparent: Made from high-grade metal with a lockable door and a clear tempered glass front for easy visibility of contents.
  • Organized Storage: Features 3 shelves and a removable upper compartment with dividers, perfect for storing various first-aid supplies and medications.
  • Durable Construction: High-grade GI metal with a 6-way processed powder coating ensures rust resistance for long-lasting use.
  • Versatile Placement: Mounts on the wall or sits conveniently on a tabletop (hardware included).
  • Stylish Design: Sleek and attractive, this first-aid box complements various environments like homes, offices, schools, and workplaces.

This spacious and secure first-aid box by Plantex keeps your medical supplies readily accessible and well-organized in a visually appealing way.

title: FIRST AID KIT 25 PERSON WHITE BOX - Office First Aid Kit, Contains A Neoprene Seal, Dustproof, for Business Companies, Small Factories, Workshops, Labs,
body:
• Contents:
    • 1 Adhesive Tape Roll
    • 2 Elastic Bandage 5 x 450cm rolls
    • 2 Elastic Bandage 7.5 x 450cm rolls
    • 25 Adhesive Plasters pcs
    • 5 Sterile Gauze pkts 7.5 x 7.5cm
    • 5 Sterile Gauze pkts 5 x 5cm
    • 3 Soap Wipe pcs
    • 3 Cleansing Wipe pcs
    • 4 Alcohol Prep Pad pcs
    • 3 Antiseptic Wip pcs
    • 10 Safety Pins pcs
    • 2 Gloves pairs
    • 1 Scissors
    • 1 Sterile Tweezers
    • 4 Cotton Wool Pack pkts
    • 1 Adhesive Dressing, pkt 10 x 6 cm
    • 2 Hemostatic Lancet pcs
    • 1 Triangular Bandage pc
    • 1 Compress Bandage roll 8 x 10cm
    • 1 ABS Box

 

 

First Aid Kit 25 Person White Box

This well-equipped first-aid kit is suitable for businesses, small factories, workshops, labs, and other workplaces with up to 25 people.

  • Key Features:
    • Durable Construction: Strong, shiny, and easy-to-clean ABS plastic ensures long-lasting use.
    • Dustproof Protection: Neoprene seal keeps contents clean and protected from dust.
    • Wall Mountable: Convenient wall bracket for space-saving storage and easy access.
    • Organized Interior: Crystal partitions allow for flexible and efficient organization of first-aid supplies.
    • Secure Closure: Two swivel catches keep the kit securely closed.

 

  • Recommended for:
    • Business environments
    • Small factories
    • Workshops
    • Laboratories
    • And other workplaces requiring a 25-person first-aid kit

First Aid Kit 100 Person Orange Box

This substantial first-aid kit is designed for businesses, small factories, workshops, labs, and other workplaces with up to 100 people.

  • Key Features:
    • Durable Construction: Strong, shiny, and easy-to-clean ABS plastic ensures long-lasting use.
    • Dustproof Protection: Neoprene seal keeps contents clean and protected from dust.
    • Wall Mountable: Convenient wall bracket for space-saving storage and easy access.
    • Organized Interior: Crystal partitions allow for flexible and efficient organization of first-aid supplies.
    • Secure Closure: Two swivel catches keep the kit securely closed.

 

  • Recommended for:
    • Business environments
    • Small factories
    • Workshops
    • Laboratories
    • And other workplaces requiring a 100-person first-aid kit

 

  • Additional Considerations:
  • Contents: While this kit is designed for 100 people, the exact contents may vary. Be sure to check the contents list or contact the manufacturer for details.
  • Compliance: Some workplaces may have specific regulations regarding the contents of first-aid kits. Ensure this kit meets any relevant compliance requirements.
  • Supplements: Depending on your workplace hazards, you may want to consider supplementing this kit with additional items.

By following these tips, you can ensure you have a well-equipped first-aid kit suitable for your specific needs.

title: 3M Peltor Helmet-Mounted Earmuffs
body:
Features:

Safety Helmet:

    -  Adjustable Height: Allows for a customized fit for different head sizes.

Ear Muffs:

    -  High Flexibility ABS Arms: Might offer a comfortable fit around the ears due to the flexibility in positioning.
    -  Synthetic Padded Cups: Aims for comfort during wear. However, the material (synthetic) might not be as breathable as some earmuff cup materials (e.g., leather).

Possible Applications:

    -  Construction: Protects the head from falling objects and reduces noise from loud machinery.
    -  Manufacturing: Similar to construction applications, offering head and ear protection in environments with noise and potential impact hazards.
    -  Other Applications: Any situation requiring both head and ear protection (e.g., forestry, some mining applications).

Additional Information:

    -  Easy Removal and Replacement: This feature might be convenient for situations where ear muffs need to be removed and attached frequently.

title: SAFFAS SAFETY HELMET MINING SF-06 - ABS + PC Heavy Duty helmet, ventilated, Textile Harness with Pin wheel Knob adjustable ratchet, Chinstrap adjustable.
body:
Heavy-Duty ABS Mining Helmet with Adjustable Features

This description highlights the key features of a heavy-duty helmet designed for mining work.

  • Material:
    • Constructed from ABS Plastic, known for its Durability and Impact Resistance

 

  • Protection:
    • Ideal for Mining environments where head protection is crucial.

 

  • Adjustability:
    • Adjustable ratchet system allows for a Personalized and Secure Fit.
    • Chin Strap ensures the helmet stays securely positioned on the head.
    • Ventilation: Equipped with a ventilator to promote airflow and keep the wearer Cool and Comfortable.

title: explosion proof torch light uae
body:
Intrinsically Safe Flashlight (For use in hazardous locations)

The 3C flashlight is a waterproof, non-conductive, thermoplastic LED flashlight with push-button tail switch for one-hand operation. Waterproof to IP67 rating.

Product certified as follows;
1. UL USA
2. IECEx
3. Atex
4. CE
5. RoHS
6. REACH

 

Features

  • Uses Cree XP-E LED.
  • Two ways position clip.
  • Fastener prevents from opening torch in hazardous places.
  • Valve design helps to hydrogen gas released.

 

 

Function

Special Fastener:
Secures lamp cap preventing users to change battery in hazardous locations.
Push Button:
Allows users to operate functions easily.
Clip:
Allow users to mount the flashlight on a wall.
Valve:
Releases gas pressure in the enclosure.

title: Safeman Coverall: Reliable Protection & Comfort for Various Work Environments
body:
Features and Benefits:

  • Features:
    • 100% Cotton: Provides breathability and comfort for extended wear compared to some non-woven coveralls.
    • Dual Color: Likely orange and green based on available colors (check with seller for confirmation).
    • Hi-Visibility Reflecting Tape: Stitched tape enhances wearer visibility in low-light conditions, improving safety.

 

  • Possible Applications:

This type of coverall could be suitable for various applications where both comfort and visibility are important:

    • Construction Sites: Increased visibility for workers near moving vehicles or machinery.
    • Roadside Assistance: Enhanced visibility for workers assisting on roadsides.
    • Traffic Control: Improved visibility for personnel directing traffic.
    • General Maintenance: Applications where comfort and some visibility are desired.

title: AAA SAFE SAFETY JACKET AAA/SJ-72 - 120 GSM Polyester knitted fabric, Duo Colored Safety jacket with high visibility reflective tape with zipper
body:
High-Visibility Safety Vest with Pockets (Green/Dark Blue) - Detailed Breakdown

This description highlights a safety vest designed for good visibility, storage, and breathability.

  • Visibility:
    • Reflective Tape Strips: Located on the front and back for 360° visibility in low light.
    • Fluorescent Green Color: Enhances daytime visibility for coworkers and drivers.
    • Dark Blue Accents: May provide a professional look while maintaining high visibility with green.

 

  • Comfort and Fit:
    • Mesh Back: Breathable 120 GSM polyethylene mesh back panel allows for airflow and helps keep you cool.
    • Front Panel: Made from durable 120 GSM polyester for a balance of breathability and toughness.
    • Free Size: One size fits most with dimensions of 70cm height and 60cm width (check if this fits your needs).

 

  • Functionality:

Multipurpose Use: Suitable for various applications including:

    • Cyclists
    • Motorists
    • Construction workers
    • Indoor/Outdoor use (day or night)

 

  • Durable: Made of a combination of tough polyester and flexible polyethylene mesh.
  • Storage: Four pockets and a zippered back pocket for convenience.
  • Double Reflective Tape: High-quality reflective tape on shoulders, chest, and back for enhanced visibility.
  • Professional Design: Dark blue accents might add a professional touch.

 

Overall, this safety vest seems like a practical choice for improving visibility in low-light environments while offering storage space and breathability. The back mesh panel might be especially beneficial for hot or humid work environments.

title: Fingersaver
body:
Without the Finger Saver you are exposing yourself to potential hand or finger injuries. Your hands are your most important day to day tool. If you damage your hands, or particularly and more importantly, your fingers, you will be affected in everything you do. From getting dressed to washing your face; you will have a constant reminder of an injury that could have been avoided. Don't put your hands where they can be injured, stay safe. When using the FingerSaver you are able to keep your hands away from any potential danger of impact. The FingerSaver is designed to be held by you, or it can be held in position by a work colleague to further reduce the risk of injury. The FingerSaver tool allows you to mitigate any risk involved in the task at hand and it gives you the confidence to perform the work activity safely, without injury to your hands

title: Denso tape
body:
Denso Tape is a cold-applied corrosion prevention and sealing tape based on a synthetic fabric, impregnated and coated with a neutral petrolatum compound. Versatile, easy to use, surface tolerant and long-lasting, it can be used as an effective solution to a multitude of corrosion prevention problems on steel pipework and fittings.

Denso Tape is a component of Denso’s recommended system for P1 specifications covering the protection of ferrous pipes, joints and fittings within the water industry

title: Non Spark Plastic Shovel
body:
Non spark shovel or polypropylene shovel features a standard-sized blade with a solid shaft. It is lightweight,

durable and ideal for a many of applications.

This shovel ideal for spill clean and will not rust, it is anti-sparking and high resistant to oils and chemicals.

All products in the same range as this shovel have been manufactured with an additive to

attract moisture to the surface and assist in reducing the build-up of static charge.

Simply wipe the blade with a damp cloth prior to use to reduce surface static.

Reduces the risk of electric or normal sparks during an oil spill clean-up operation as it is made from polypropylene.
